/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red brick, adding a touch of historical charm to the modern cityscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The street itself is devoid of any pedestrians or vehicles, giving it a serene, almost deserted appearance. On either side of the street, trees and shrubs can be seen, their greenery providing a stark contrast to the red brick buildings. The image does not contain any discernible text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with buildings, trees, and shrubs neatly arranged along the street. The absence of people and vehicles adds a sense of tranquility to the otherwise busy city scene.
